Package triple.com

Class Progress

java.lang.Object
triple.com.Progress
public class Progress extends Object
Represents a client's progress towards a specific fitness goal. The goal can be related to weight loss, muscle building, flexibility, etc.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Progress(String goalType, double startValue, double targetValue)
    Constructs a new Progress object with the specified goal type, start value, and target value.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    calcProgress()
    Calculates the percentage of progress made towards the target value.
    String
    getGoalType()
    Gets the type of the goal (e.g., Weight Loss, Muscle Building).
    String
    getProgressSummary()
    Returns a summary of the client's progress, including the goal type, current value, target value, and the percentage of progress made.
    void
    updateProgress(double newValue)
    Updates the current progress value for the goal.

  • Constructor Details

    • Progress

      public Progress(String goalType, double startValue, double targetValue)
      Constructs a new Progress object with the specified goal type, start value, and target value.
      Parameters:
      goalType - The type of the goal (e.g., Weight Loss, Muscle Building).
      startValue - The initial value of the client's progress.
      targetValue - The target value the client wants to achieve.

  • Method Details

    • updateProgress

      public void updateProgress(double newValue)
      Updates the current progress value for the goal.
      Parameters:
      newValue - The new value of the client's progress.

    • getProgressSummary

      public String getProgressSummary()
      Returns a summary of the client's progress, including the goal type, current value, target value, and the percentage of progress made.
      Returns:
      A string summarizing the client's progress.

    • calcProgress

      public String calcProgress()
      Calculates the percentage of progress made towards the target value.
      Returns:
      A string representing the progress percentage formatted as a percentage (e.g., "75.50%").

    • getGoalType

      public String getGoalType()
      Gets the type of the goal (e.g., Weight Loss, Muscle Building).
      Returns:
      The type of the goal.
